description:
Interested in shedding some extra pounds? This Yoga for Weight Loss class package is your answer! This Yoga for Weight Loss course is specifically designed to create heat in the body, lower stress hormones, increase insulin sensitivity, and increase metabolism while burning fat, all in the comfort of your own home. This course also has supplemental classes that are broken up into different lengths so you can customize your practice - allowing you to grow your practice gradually based on your progress, or simply choose the perfect length for the amount of time you have available that day.

You will be amazed at how yoga can help you shed pounds during your weight loss journey! There is a reason yoga continues to grow in popularity across the globe. This is your chance to see how yoga can make you feel more calm and balanced, lighter on your feet, less reactive and in the best shape of your life! Take this Yoga for Weight Loss course today!

YogaDownload.com is the trusted source for top quality online yoga instruction.
title: Yoga for Weight Loss by YogaDownload.com
instructors: Yoga Download, Dawnelle Arthur, Jackie Casal
